column1: The Purple Pig////After many recommendations - both Yelp and from friends
column2: my wife & I visited last night. Thankfully
column4: we walked in and were seated immediately.  We sat inside at a cozy marble topped table for two. They also have an outside area
column5: that's covered and heated - and is much quieter than inside. There was music pumping so conversation was tough - between the music
column6: people speaking loudly to get over the music
column7: and the occasional staff yelling to announce food is ready!
